sentences.en: By degrees the quality gave up going , and the fair, of course, became disreputable.
sentences.cn: 上流人渐渐不去那儿了, 当然集市就变得破旧不堪了.

sentences.en: Don't go to the disreputable place of entertainment.
sentences.cn: 不要去那种名声不好的娱乐场所.

sentences.en: Francs have a rich and disreputable past.
sentences.cn: 法郎历史悠久,声名狼藉.

sentences.en: He had a vaguely disreputable appearance.
sentences.cn: 他看上去有些不那么体面.

sentences.en: He had acquired a wide acquaintance with the more disreputable quarters of the city.
sentences.cn: 他对这座城市的那些不体面的地区逐渐都熟悉起来.

sentences.en: Hunted and disreputable cats recognized her at a glance as their refuge and champion.
sentences.cn: 被人追赶的、狼狈的野猫一眼就能认出她是它们的庇护人和护卫者.

sentences.en: I've been accused of using disreputable Methods : To get what I want.
sentences.cn: 我被指控采取不正当的手段以 谋取 私利.

sentences.en: She spent the evening with her disreputable brother Stefan.
sentences.cn: 她同声名狼藉的弟弟斯蒂芬一起度过了这个傍晚。

sentences.en: Soho is one of London's more disreputable areas.
sentences.cn: 索霍区是伦敦名声较差的街区.

sentences.en: That dive attracts every disreputable people.
sentences.cn: 那家下流酒吧吸引声名狼藉的人.

sentences.en: The hypochondriac remains a disreputable figure , solipsistic and even immune to the real suffering of others.
sentences.cn: 强迫症患者仍然声名不佳,他们唯我独尊,对他人真实的痛苦甚至毫不理会.

sentences.en: Their armed forces were an ill - equipped, untrained and sometimes disreputable lot.
sentences.cn: 他们的武装力量装备差, 未经训练,有时甚至声名狼藉.

sentences.en: To make matters worse, Jesus has begun consorting with disreputable people like Mary Magdalene, a prostitute.
sentences.cn: 耶稣开始安慰一些像是马利亚这样名誉不好的妓女,而这样的行为似乎让事情变的更糟.

sentences.en: What has Krogstad done that Torvald finds so disreputable?
sentences.cn: Krogstad做了什么让Torvald觉得不堪的事?

sentences.en: Why else would I have chosen such a disreputable looking cretin?
sentences.cn: 为什么我选中的其他人象个白痴?

words.tran_cn: 声名狼藉的；肮脏的；破烂不堪的

trans.tran_cn: 名誉不好的，不体面的，不名誉，为人所不齿
trans.tran_en: considered to be dishonest, bad, illegal etc
